sourcesContent:
import Chart from "../Chart/Chart"

const ExpensesChart = ({expenses})=>{
    const charDataPoints = [
        {label:'Jan', value:0},
        {label:'Feb', value:0},
        {label:'Mar', value:0},
        {label:'Apr', value:0},
        {label:'May', value:0},
        {label:'Jun', value:0},
        {label:'Jul', value:0},
        {label:'Aug', value:0},
        {label:'Sep', value:0},
        {label:'Oct', value:0},
        {label:'Nov', value:0},
        {label:'Dec', value:0},
    ]
    for (const expense of expenses){
        const expesneMonth = expense.date.getMonth()
        charDataPoints[expesneMonth].value += expense.amount
    }
    
    return <Chart dataPoints={charDataPoints} />
}

export default ExpensesChart
